name: HumanHutSim
description:
-Human Hut Sim Prototype- 

Procedural Generation, Sandbox, World Building tool

_______________________________________________________________

            This World has Died but it is just the beginning. 

                          You need to Rebuild this world.  

______________________________________________________________

    W A S D = Move                Mouse 3 = Hold and swipe to Move     

                Hold Right Click = Open "Build tools" Menu

             Left Click = Place Down "BuildTool" Object's

_______________________________________________________________

                                                  ( Instructions )

 - Open "Build Tool Menu"  by Holding Down the Right Mouse Button

                                     1     - Build "Grass" Patch

                                        2         - Place "Seeds" 

                                     3     - "Water" The Seeds

                                         4 - Build a "Moutain"

_______________________________________________________________

                     Made in 10 Days for GameDev.tv 2022

         (Program and All Assests By: Patrick Carmichael)
